descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

tableName.name: tableName
tableName.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tableName.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

inputDataFieldName.name: inputDataFieldName
inputDataFieldName.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload
inputDataFieldName.ai_hint: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload

options.name: options
sysparm_exclude_reference_link
options.description: Whether to exclude Table API links for reference fields

options.name: sysparm_fields
options.description: A list of fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
options.hint: String of comma separated values or an array of strings can be set in an expression

options.name: sysparm_query
options.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results. More info.

options.name: sysparm_display_value
options.description: Choose which values to return

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

attachmentId.name: attachmentId
attachmentId.description: Sys_id value of the attachment to delete
attachmentId.ai_hint: Sys_id value of the attachment to delete

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

outputField.name: outputField
outputField.description: Field name where downloaded data will be placed
outputField.ai_hint: Field name where downloaded data will be placed

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: active
options.description: Whether to activate the user

options.name: building
options.description: The Building address

options.name: city
options.description: City of the user

options.name: company
options.description: The name of the company for the user

options.name: country
options.description: Country of the user

options.name: department
options.description: Department of the user

options.name: email
options.description: The email address associated with the user

options.name: first_name
options.description: The first name of the user

options.name: gender
options.description: The gender of the user

options.name: home_phone
options.description: Home phone of the user

options.name: last_name
options.description: The last name of the user

options.description: Location of the user

options.name: manager
options.description: Manager of the user

options.name: middle_name
options.description: The middle name of the user

options.name: mobile_phone
options.description: Mobile phone number of the user

options.name: user_password
options.description: The user's password

options.name: password_needs_reset
options.description: Whether to require a password reset when the user logs in

options.name: phone
options.description: The main phone number of the user

options.name: roles
options.description: Roles of the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: state
options.description: State for the user

options.name: street
options.description: Street information for the user separated by comma

options.name: user_name
options.description: A username associated with the user (e.g. user_name.123)

options.name: zip
options.description: Zip code for the user

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

dataToSend.name: dataToSend

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input names match destination field names

options.name: Define Below for Each Column
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

options.name: Nothing
options.description: Don't send any column data

dataToSend.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all inputs.
inputsToIgnore.ai_hint: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all inputs.

fieldsToSend.name: fieldsToSend

values.name: column
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

getOption.name: getOption
getOption.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation IN ["upload", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'tableName'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputDataFieldName'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'download'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'outputField'
IF resource == 'attachment' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'businessService' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'businessService' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'businessService' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'businessService' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'configurationItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'configurationItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'configurationItems' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'configurationItems' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'department' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'department' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'department' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'department' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'dictionary' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'dictionary' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'dictionary' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'dictionary' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'incident' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'short_description'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'incident' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'incident' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableName'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataToSend'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'create' AND dataToSend == 'mapInput' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputsToIgnore'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'create' AND dataToSend == 'columns' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToSend'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableName'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tableRecord' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tableRecord' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'tableName'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableName'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataToSend'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'update' AND dataToSend == 'mapInput' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputsToIgnore'
IF resource == 'tableRecord' AND operation == 'update' AND dataToSend == 'columns' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToSend'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'short_description'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'getOption'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' AND getOption == 'user_name' THEN SHOW parameter 'user_name'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' AND getOption == 'id' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'userGroup' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'userRole' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'userRole' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'userRole' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'userRole' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
